TopicTitle: Camera centered off rocket when loading a quick save

Articles.Content: Whenever I reload from a quick save point, or exit the game and load a save, and my rocket is in orbit or landing, the camera centers behind the rocket. It makes it very difficult to focus on the rocket and do maneuvers and land. It appears that the camera might be resetting to the center point of the rocket when its on the launch pad. When you play and drop the stages the camera will auto update, but loading the save it seems to revert to that first camera spot.   Pressing home doesn't update the camera to the correct spot. Moving the arrow keys is not a viable solution.
